StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetQSNByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @strQSNNumber char(9) ) AS
-- from sp_GetQSNData SELECT QSN.QSN_ID, QSN.FY, QSN.STATUS, OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID, QSN.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION_ID, QSN.AssignedRssOrgId, QSN.RUC, MOS.OCCUPATION_CODE, QSN.MOS, QSN.GENDER, QSN.MSC, QSN.SPLIT_INCREMENT, QSN.COMPONENT_CODE, CONVERT(CHAR(11), QSN.QSN_PIVOT_DATE, 106) AS QSN_PIVOT_DATE, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(LEFT(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, 1), SPACE(0)) AS POOLEE, COALESCE(C.CONTRACT_ID, 0) AS CONTRACT_ID, COALESCE(NWA.NWA_ID, 0) AS NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, C.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, C.COMPONENT_CODE AS POOLEE_COMPONENT_CODE, QSN.QSN_REQUIRED FROM QSN WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MOS ON QSN.MOS = MOS.MOS_CODE INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON QSN.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTRACT C ON QSN.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN NWA ON C.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PERSON P ON NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID WHERE QSN.QSN_ID = @strQSNNumber
